channel.title: Maps on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on ZooBerry

item.title: Asia Template Map
item.description: A map of asia.

item.title: Australia and the Southeast Asiatic Template Map
item.description: A map of Australia and Southeast Asiatic.

item.title: Blank Grassy Template Map
item.description: For those individuals who like to start from scratch occasionally, here’s a completely blank map. No elevation, foliage, anything.

item.title: Desert Oasis AA Template Map
item.description: This is my version of desert oasis. Please do not get this mixed up with the ES version.

item.title: Eagle's View Template Map
item.description: I wanted to create a map with a waterfall as the focal point when entering the zoo.

item.title: Egg Island Template Map
item.description: A grassland zoo with an egg in the center. Everything else is water. Expansions required none.

item.title: Europe Template Map
item.description: A map of Europe.

item.title: Hastick Woods Template Map
item.description: This map has several waterfalls nestled through wooded areas. Also features two reflecting pools at the entrance and was designed on a large map.

item.title: Hedge Maze II Template Map
item.description: A hedge maze with a small zoo in the center. Expansions required none.

item.title: Mysterious Creature Zoo
item.description: What Creature was here? Using grassland biome water footprints show up randomly around the zoo. No expansions are required.

item.title: North America Template Map
item.description: A map of North America.

item.title: Ocean City Template Map
item.description: This is my ZT2 version of the salt water zoo in ZT1. It uses Tropical Rainforest for the biome and no expansions are required.

item.title: Plain Old Grass Template Map
item.description: Have you ever wanted to have a basic grass map like the old zt? well i have gone through the trouble of making one! this map is in north america, and is a large map.

item.title: Plain Tundra Template Map
item.description: This is a large map based in Antarctica. All it is, is a flat map with nothing on it. Enjoy!

item.title: Plymouth Rock Template Map
item.description: A map of what is thought to be a Zoo Tycoon 2 replica of Plymouth Rock.

item.title: Safari Islands Template Map
item.description: This zoo consists of a number of wild savannah islands with paths, fenced guests paths, and 4 guest areas between the island. One big food court at the entrance, a few smaller areas on other places.

item.title: Six Template Pack Maps
item.description: This pack contains six freeform template maps on which you can build your zoos. Five are completely blank, flat, featureless expanses ideal for grid-based zoos and for starting from scratch. The sixth contains six exhibit spaces clearly marked out and a handsome entrance already built.

item.title: South African Template Map
item.description: A relatively flat expanse of savannah with no foliage, no trees and no rocks. Made from the small savannah map. Should work without expansions.

item.title: Lavender Fields
item.description: Lavender Fields is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by Wiene.

item.title: Paranoia Graveyard
item.description: Paranoia Graveyard is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by PrimevalRaptor.

item.title: Temperate Bridges
item.description: Temperate Bridges is a map for Zoo Tycoon 2 created by ceej12.

item.title: Tropical Coast
item.description: A blank tropical coast map for Zoo Tycoon 2, created by Super Utah Thief.

item.title: Blank Tropical Rainforest Zoo
item.description: A blank tropical rainforest zoo map for Zoo Tycoon 2, created by NicolasZoo.

item.title: Sonoharan Desert
item.description: A desert map made by Raja Harimau.

item.title: Zoo Irvine
item.description: This zoo has 7 different sections.

item.title: Hedge Maze
item.description: My ultimate uber hedge maze

item.title: Himalayan Mountain Range
item.description: All the foliage is from Artifex’s Arabian Nights.

item.title: Volcanoes National Park
item.description: All the foliage in the map is from Artifex’s Arabian Nights.
